title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Legacy
materials: meticulously set in a platinum or white gold base. Features carefully selected
vibrant green Emeralds (Eme:-11.53(5)). Expertly crafted with a focus on Hyderabadi diamond-setting techniques
ensuring enduring brilliance and intricate detail.
features: This stunning haaram showcases a cascading, multi-strand design with floral diamond clusters interspersed with Emeralds. The leaf-shaped diamond designs create a delicate and feminine aesthetic. The Emeralds are expertly set to enhance their brilliance. The arrangement of diamonds and emeralds adds depth and dimension, making this haaram a statement piece.
colors: Predominantly brilliant white (diamonds) and vibrant green (emeralds)
creating a striking and elegant contrast.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and milestone anniversaries. Also suitable for Seemantham
and other significant family events. Can be paired with both traditional silk sarees and modern evening gowns.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional Hyderabadi jewelry-making techniques with a contemporary design sensibility. The combination of high-quality diamonds and vivid emeralds creates a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. The floral motifs symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful gift for special occasions. Exudes regal elegance and sophisticated charm.
